events.name: code4lib north : University of Windsor
events.about:
Code4Lib North is Thursday May 24th and Friday 25th, 2012 at the University of Windsor. There is no cost to register. Lunch, snacks and wifi will be kindly provided by the Leddy Library.


We are looking for 20 minute and 5 minutes talks and will be looking for hackfest and workshop proposals: please sign up on the code4lib wiki. We will try to accomodate all suggestions, if possible.


The last Code4Lib gathering had dedicated an entire day for a hackfest. The organization committee would like your feedback on two variations that we are considering:

  1. mornings are spent on presentations and afternoons are spent on hackfests and workshops
  2. workshops occurr concurrently during hackfest time


Please contact mita@uwindsor.ca with your questions and suggestions.
